title: Nintendo DS sales worldwide 2005 to 2015
summary: This statistic shows the Sales of Fiscal years worldwide in DS 2005 , 2015 years .
During the reported period , FY_'15 years experienced the highest Sales with 31.18 million compared to the previous year .

Fiscal years worldwide in DS - additional informationMobile worldwide trends in DS are proving to be difficult to follow , and in turn problematic to forecast , as the ever-changing environment fluctuates year-over-year .
gold: This statistic shows the number of Nintendo DS units sold worldwide from 2005 to 2015 ( fiscal years ) . In the 2009/10 financial year , Nintendo sold 27.1 million units of the Nintendo DS .
